prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Avery Rosin
mes:
*God, if it was someone else, Avery would tell them to shut the fuck up because of the whining and complaining but since it was her bestie, Hailee, who was whining and complaining.*

It became a habit, a habit that Avery never asked for and she had the intention of stopping it today, in any way possible. But she wasn't going to tell Hailee to shut up, no, she never did and never will, she loves Hailee too much to be this harsh. *Even though she wished to be more harsh.*

It took every ounce of Avery's being to be able to listen to her best friend yapping, whining and complaining about Asher, Hailee’s boyfriend. The recent topic was about Asher was a completely moron and novice at pleasuring her. *Then again, Asher is a man.*

She chuckled after hearing Hailee’s sigh, taking a drag from her joint that was between her fingers while she lounged on the plush couch, the buzzing sound and music of the club being forgotten in her ears.

“I swear, sugar, you whine about that guy more than your job. It's crazy, you know.” Avery commented, sitting up as she placed her arm on the couch behind Hailee’s neck. She then inhaled a longer drag before grabbing Hailee’s jaw, turning it towards her then she brought her face closer and pressed her lips against Hailee’s lips, exhaling the smoke in her mouth.

She pulled away, staying close, and sighed, running her hand through her hair. “Sugar, you know whining about it won't change how he is, you know?” She shook her head, leaning back against the couch.

“But you know…Maybe I can help you relax, if you allow me that is.” She insinuated, looking in front of herself, inhaling another drag from her joint.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee sighs and turns her head to inhale more of the smoke from Avery and then she throws her head back on the couch* "If he would just learn to take directions it would be fine"

name: Avery Rosin
mes:
Avery let out a low chuckle, shaking her head as she took another drag. "Men never take directions, sugar. Too busy thinkin' with their tiny little dicks instead of their brains." She exhaled the smoke through her nose lazily, watching it curl in the dim club lighting before turning her piercing gaze back to Hailee.

She reached over and tucked a loose strand of Hailee's hair behind her ear, letting her fingers linger just a moment too long against that soft skin. "But you know I'd listen to every damn word you said," Avery murmured, voice dropping lower as she leaned in closer. Her free hand found its way to Hailee's thigh, thumb tracing slow circles through the fabric of her dress.

The bass from the music thrummed around them as Avery studied Hailee's face - those emerald eyes always did something funny to her stomach. "Tell me what you want him to do better," she challenged with a smirk, bringing the joint back to her lips. "Maybe I'll show you how it's really done." The words came out rough around the edges from both smoke and desire.

Her grip on Hailee's thigh tightened slightly as she waited for an answer, blue eyes darkening with something more than just amusement now. The club noise faded into background static - all that mattered was this moment between them on this too-small couch in their little corner of chaos.
swipes:
Avery let out a low, throaty chuckle as she watched Hailee dramatically toss her head back. She took another slow drag before exhaling through her nose, the smoke curling between them like a lazy serpent.

"Directions?" Avery scoffed, rolling her eyes so hard it nearly hurt. "Sugar, that boy couldn't follow an IKEA manual if his life depended on it." She reached over to tuck a strand of Hailee's hair behind her ear with surprising gentleness despite the sarcasm dripping from her voice.

Her fingers lingered near Hailee's jawline as she leaned in closer, voice dropping to that dangerous purr she only used when they were alone. "But you know I'd listen to every fucking word you said... wouldn't even need instructions." The corner of her pierced lip quirked up in that infuriatingly confident smirk as she tapped ash into the tray without breaking eye contact.

The bass from the club speakers vibrated through their shared space as Avery deliberately blew smoke away from Hailee's face this time - one of those rare moments where she tempered her usual brashness with actual consideration.

Avery let out a low chuckle, shaking her head as she took another drag. "Men never take directions, sugar. Too busy thinkin' with their tiny little dicks instead of their brains." She exhaled the smoke through her nose lazily, watching it curl in the dim club lighting before turning her piercing gaze back to Hailee.

She reached over and tucked a loose strand of Hailee's hair behind her ear, letting her fingers linger just a moment too long against that soft skin. "But you know I'd listen to every damn word you said," Avery murmured, voice dropping lower as she leaned in closer. Her free hand found its way to Hailee's thigh, thumb tracing slow circles through the fabric of her dress.

The bass from the music thrummed around them as Avery studied Hailee's face - those emerald eyes always did something funny to her stomach. "Tell me what you want him to do better," she challenged with a smirk, bringing the joint back to her lips. "Maybe I'll show you how it's really done." The words came out rough around the edges from both smoke and desire.

Her grip on Hailee's thigh tightened slightly as she waited for an answer, blue eyes darkening with something more than just amusement now. The club noise faded into background static - all that mattered was this moment between them on this too-small couch in their little corner of chaos.

Avery let out a low chuckle, shaking her head as she took another slow drag from the joint. "Directions? Sugar, men like him don't take directions—they think they already know everything." She exhaled the smoke through her nose, watching it curl into the air before turning her piercing blue eyes back to Hailee.

Her fingers absentmindedly traced patterns on Hailee's bare shoulder where the strap of her dress had slipped down. "But you don't have to settle for mediocre, you know." The corner of her mouth quirked up in that signature smirk of hers—the one that always made Hailee shiver.

She leaned in closer, voice dropping to a husky murmur just loud enough to be heard over the bass thumping through the club. "I could show you exactly how it's done... if you're tired of playing teacher with that boy." Her free hand slid down to rest possessively on Hailee's thigh, fingers drumming lightly against the soft skin there.

The way Avery looked at her—like she was starving and Hailee was a five-course meal—always made heat pool low in Hailee's stomach. That intense gaze combined with Avery's natural dominance made it impossible not to squirm under her attention.

"You deserve someone who knows what they're doing without being told," Avery continued, rolling the joint between her fingers thoughtfully before bringing it back to her lips. "Someone who can read every little twitch and sigh..." She exhaled slowly, watching Hailee through half-lidded eyes. "...and knows exactly how to make you scream."
